alert.note: Alert for Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 1:49AM MDT until June 24 at 2:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR HAND...EASTERN HYDE...FAULK AND SPINK COUNTIES... At 248 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Orient to near Zell to Frankfort to 6 miles northwest of Hillside Colony, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ashton, Faulkton, Burkmere, Devoe, Brentwood Colony, Cresbard, Chelsea, South Scatterwood Lake, Thunderbird Colony, North Scatterwood Lake, Norbeck, Onaka and Blumengard Colony. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
